name: [glass angel]
description:
Welcome to hell.

[glass angel] is a shoot-'em-up, inspired by the Touhou franchise, but with a twist. In the game, you control two separate shooters simultaneously - either of which can take damage. The game is based around the cliched idiom of 'stay in your lane' - which means that each shooter occupies an exclusive half of the screen, and you must improvise to fight enemies who will routinely go across the border.

[glass angel] features beautiful and abstract backgrounds that were made using hand-painted watercolors and then digitally scanned. It also features an entirely original OST and five unique types of enemies, including a boss fight (currently not finished)! We hope you enjoy it.

Controls

WASD - Move Ava

Arrow keys - Move Finch

Dialogue can be advanced or skipped with any keyboard key or a mouse click.

Ava and Finch will fire bullets automatically.

Credits

Jane Lewis - Director, Original Concept, Programming

Valendar - Background Art, Character Designs, Animation, Sprites

VVren - Soundtrack

Quinn - Incidental Music

Note

This game was made as part of the 2022 Github Game Off. It is currently not finished, but approximately 1.5 levels are playable. A lot more polish and refinement is needed. Expect bugs and oddities!

Technical Details

This game was made from the ground up with the Amulet engine: http://amulet.xyz.
